Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7159 affecting package rubygem-http_parser for versions less than 0.8.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-7159 affecting package rubygem-http_parser for versions less than 0.8.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-http_parser is earlier than 0.8.0-1, affected by CVE-2018-7159
